news.title: Topshelf Records Launches Donation Initiative for Aid in Gaza

news.title: Sony Music Sues Napster Over Missed Royalty Payments
news.summary: The company is claiming $9.2 million in unpaid royalties and a potential $36 million in damages from copyright infringement
